content: celtic headband designed by juliana lustenader preparation size adult stretches to 20 easily adjustable for any head size gauge 17 sts = 4 in stockinette stitch yarn 1 skein of presto by sweet paprika yarns 4 06 oz/115 g 135 yds/ 123 m 80% merino wool 20% nylon in colorway boysenberry or any bulky weight yarn to match gauge needles us size #8 5mm needles or any size necessary to obtain gauge other materials cable needle cn photos by louis mensinger darning needle for more original knitting patterns by juliana lustenader visit www ravelry com/designers/juliana-lustenader september 27 2018 version 2 designed by juliana lustenader all rights reserved celtic pattern pattern key co 24 sts bobble bind off row 1 rs sl 1 p1 4-st rc p4 4-st rc twice p2 k knit row 2 and all ws row sl1 k the ks and p the ps* repeat repeat row 3 sl1 3-st rpc 4-st lpc 4-st rpc twice 3-st lpc p1 co cast on p purl row 5 3-st rpc p3 4-st lc p4 4-st lc p3 3-st lpc sl rs slip 1 st purl-wise row 7 sl 1 k1 p3 3-st rpc 4-st lpc 4-st rpc 3-st lpc p3 k2 wyb ws slip 1 st purl- row 9 sl 1 k1 p3 k2 p3 4-st rc p3 k2 twice wise wyf row 11 sl 1 k1 p3 3-st lpc 4-st rpc 4-st lpc 3-st rpc p3 k2 wyb with yarn in back row 13 3-st lpc p3 4-st lc p4 4-st lc p3 3-st rpc wyf with yarn in front row 15 sl 1 3-st lpc 4-st rpc 4-st lpc twice 3-st rpc p1 *where there is a knit st the row before knit where there is a purl st the row before purl repeat row 1-16 seven more times or once the piece fits head snuggly repeat row 1 and 2 once more bobble all sts knit-wise finishing cut yarn leaving a long tail block piece to 20 long or desired length o nce blocked and dry use the long tail to seam the co and bobble edges together weave in ends wear and enjoy photos by louis mensinger yarn support by sweet paprika
